attributes.action: Make ST Georges Day a Bank Holiday in England
attributes.additional_details:
Why is it being made into a racism to be proud being English?
Black , white, yellow, brown ? Doesn't matter lets get back to being proud of being English and celebrate St George every April 23rd
please sign and please direct all your English friends to this petition
attributes.background: it shouldn't be a crime to celebrate being English , the Irish celebrate St Patricks Day without being labelled racists
